summary.span: 此 API 支持 Office 和 SharePoint 基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。

span.span: This API supports the Office and SharePoint infrastructure and isn't intended to be used directly from your code.

summary.span: 包含打包和调试的 SharePoint 项目、Office 和 SharePoint 应用程序的生成任务。

span.span: Contains build tasks for packaging and debugging SharePoint projects and Office and SharePoint apps.
